content:
hey - my internet access is getting worse (didn't think that was possible). Can someone check whether 2 files have uploaded correctly for me:

  • http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3-3.0.1.zip
  • http://hl7.org/fhir/R4-4.0.0.zip

These are very large files (~1GB) and they uploaded correctly if someone with good bandwidth (like from a proper developed country e.g. Vietnam or Kenya or somewhere that has reasonable bandwidth) can download them and open the zip file in any zip archive reader
STU3 (700KB) downloaded in 30 mins on Kiwi #8 Fence Wire and unzips ok. Will now try the other...
I guess I should have listed NZ as having better options than here
R4 (1GB) downloaded and unzipped with no errors.
In Toronto, Canada, R3 (723.7 Mb) downloaded in 10 minutes and R4 (1.01 Gb) downloaded in 14 minutes. Both unzipped with no errors.
